summary: An unsophisticated young woman from the Mississippi swamps falls in love with an unconventional southern gentleman.
cast: Debbie Reynolds|Leslie Nielsen|Walter Brennan|Mala Powers|Sidney Blackmer|Mildred Natwick|Fay Wray|Philip Ober|Craig Hill|Louise Beavers|April Kent|Ralph Brooks|Lillian Culver|Lucille Curtis|Jack Edwards|Robert Filmer|Bob Hoy|Larry Hudson|Mike Lally|Carl M. Leviness|Jack Macy|Forbes Murray|Camille Williams
title: Tammy, la muchacha salvaje
